body.name: FRIZCOL Stroller Fan for Baby - Portable Fan Rechargeable - Battery Operated Fan(Use for 30Hrs) - Fan for Handheld/Clip On/Car Seat/Desk/Camping

features: 【Upgraded - Long Battery Life】- Built-in 6000mAh large capacity battery, can be used for up to 55 hours when fully charged. You can use it on the stroller for days without removing it frequently for charging. Increase product durability. Let you and your baby spend a refreshing day.

【Upgraded - Flexible Tripod】- In 2023, we made an upgrade, the tripod is made of safe and non-toxic sponge material and aluminum wire. Durable and easier to attach. It can be rotated 360° vertically and horizontally, and you can bend it to any angle you want. No matter when and where, in this hot summer, your best choice.

【Baby Friendly】- ①Soft wind: Switch between 3 wind speeds with one click, the breeze can better care for your baby's health. ②Fan cover specially designed to protect curious little fingers with <5mm spacing for peace of mind. ③Brushless motor design, the noise is lower than 25dB, allowing your baby to improve sleep quality.

【Multifunctional Fan】- A mini lightweight personal portable fan that can be used as a handheld fan, desk fan, baby fan and outdoor camping fan. A variety of supply methods allow you to use a power bank or charge it in the car (also available while charging).

【Suitable for Any Occasions】- This mini fan is small and light, easy to carry, perfect for car seat, stroller, golf cart, beach, camping, gym, travel and other outdoor activities. Our battery powered fans are your must-have summer gadget!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FRIZCOL Stroller Fan - 2023 Upgraded Version Super Battery Life Built-in 6000mAh large capacity battery. Up to 30 hours working time. Baby Friendly Design Fan cover spacing < 5mm, protect baby's small hands. Brushless Motor Soft and strong wind, noise < 25dB. ABS Material The material is safe, non-toxic, safe to baby, can be used with confidence. Multifunctional Fan Can be used as a handheld fan, desk fan, baby fan and outdoor camping fan. Suitable for Any Occasion Perfect for car seats, strollers, golf carts, beach, camping, gym, travel and other outdoor activities.

More Details about Item Soft but Strong Wind Mini but powerful stroller fan, our fan has a soft air flow and can bring a cool summer experience to the baby. Improve baby's sleep quality. Baby Friendly Design A fan cover specially designed to protect curious little fingers, with a spacing of <5mm, giving you peace of mind. High Quality Material The tripod is made of safe and non-toxic sponge material and aluminum wire. More easily broken than other models, ours are stronger and more durable.

Brushless Motor Adopt high-quality motor, low noise and fast speed. Let you feel the friendly natural wind. Convenient Charging It can be charged through the USB port of a power bank, PC, hub, socket, etc. (also available while charging) Lightweight and Portable Its weight is equivalent to that of a mobile phone. Very easy to carry and can be used in any occasion.
Multifunctional Fan Can be used as a handheld fan, desk fan, baby fan and outdoor camping fan.
Suitable for Any Occasions Perfect for car seat, stroller, golf cart, beach, camping, gym, travel and other outdoor activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for anything. I got this before I had my son which I took it to the hospital with me, now with it being winter I use it in my sons room to help circulate the humidifier, with plans to use in the summer for the hot days and beach trips! Great product, with 3 speeds and easy to charge. Long lasting battery and its compact easy to take along with you on the go and not that loud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that it’s rechargeable, 3 speed modes and the flexibility with the legs is great on a stroller, side of the chair or just comfortable to hold if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this fan when I was in the hospital after having the baby. It worked amazing. I love how easy it is to strap on to a spot and it stays. I've strapped it to the head rest in the car to help circulate hot air and I use it on the stroller. It doesn't take long to charge. The rechargeable battery makes it so convenient. It has 3 settings and they all have amazing air flow. The battery in mine lasted 3 days being ran none stop. I can also use it while it is charging. The battery will last about 2 weeks depending on how much I use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this fan !!! The settings are perfect and the highest setting is really strong for those super hot days. ALTHOUGH, the legs are not as sturdy as I’d like them to be. I’m pretty rough on my stuff and one of the legs have come off. So if you’re rough on stuff like me, just be gentle with the legs and you shouldn’t have a problem. It fits in just about anything, stroller, car seat, chair, etc. I’d buy it again for sure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best price to ability
reviews.reviewText: I have used this on several amusement park days at 90+ degrees F and it works amazing. It moves so much air it keeps my 10 months old and 4 year old very content. One of my favorite novel features is that it does not have any performance issuesues when charging and being used at the same time. Which is really important for those super long days with it at full blast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and Long-Lasting Fan!
reviews.reviewText: This fan is a winner! I got it for Disneyland trips this summer, and it impressed me. The battery lasts for hours, and I love that I can connect it to my portable charger while we're at the parks and still works. It's perfect for keeping my toddler cool.Not just for Disney, we've been using it at home whenever we need a burst of cool air. It's easy to attach and adjust, and the rechargeable feature is a big plus. The fan's airflow is just right, not too strong. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A pregnancy/postpartum must have
reviews.reviewText: I saw this all over tik tok but wasn’t sure if I would need it since my baby was born in November. As usual it was hot because I live in the desert and because of the hormones! This saved us during my dizzy spells and helped me keep cool. I don’t know what I would do without this fan. The legs were very flexible and gripped onto everything. We absolutely love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Battery last forever and it works great. Able to be attached to any surface.
Got this for my daughter, sadly my car doesn’t have tinted back windows, so it gets pretty warm in the back seat in the summer. This was very useful for her.

When we opened this product up it the fan had was broken. Has a weak attatchment point so if they had dropped your package the fan can break free from the fan. I glued it once and it lasted a day I attempted to use a stronger glue.
